unnormalised: Maje ajji, Dadi, poddli tedna heachi survat zali. Ekech pavtim "Ayushman Bharat Health Account (ABHA) ID" ani "Unique Health Identification (UHID)" oxe utram vaprunk lagle. Tedna poriant, hanv identifieranchem sodanch PAN card vo Aadhaaracher sambandh zoddlam. Atam, hospitalacho staff Dadi-chem UHID magpak laglo, jen konnakuch mahit naslem. Kalta mhonn, tem tiche pattlea hospitalatil cardacher asunk zai aslem. Ek udvegachi sodnni suru zali.
normalised: tem mhakaal makaajee, Dadi, poddli tedna shuroo zale. Achanak, "A-B-H-A I-D" ani "U-H-I-D" bhaxenchi utram vaprunk lagle. Techam poilim, hanv identifiers mhunn mazyach P-A-N cardak vo Aadhaarak joddlelem. Atam, hospitalan kam korpi lok Dadi-chem U-H-I-D magunk lagle, jen amkam konnakuch mahit naslem. Dislem ki, te tika poilichye vell hospitalant ravkaxak lagun tika melellya cardacher aspak zai aslem. Atureponan sodunk survat keli.

unnormalised: Maje cousin, Rahul, ghorantle techie, tanko lagich action ghetli. Tannem sanglam ki ABHA ID, jen health ID mhonnunui vollkhotat, tem medical recordsachem access streamline korpak asat. UHID mellonam mhonnun tannem Dadik novem ghevkachem research suru kelem. Tannem National Health Authority website kadli ani process suru keli. Tanko Dadi-chem Aadhaar number, 9876-5432-1012, ani ticho registered mobile number zai aslem.
normalised: Mazo cousin, Rahul, gharaant technology vishayachem khobrekar, tatkaalikuch kamak laglo. Tannem sangem ki A-B-H-A I-D, zaka health I-D mhunnui vollkhotat, doctori recordak sarollponan pavonk mellcho mhunn kelam. U-H-I-D amkam mellonk shakyonasli daddli lagin taka navin mezhvonk kashi mellovchi mhunn sodunk laglo. Tannem National Health Authority-chi website ugoddli ani prakriya shuroo keli. Taka Dadi-cho Aadhaar number zai aslo, nauu atth sat so dash panch char tin don dash ek shunya ek don, ani ticho register kelolo mobile number zai aslo.

unnormalised: Online form-ant tiche insurance policychi mahitiui magtali. Dislem mhonn, tiche Star Health Insurance policy-cho number, SHI/2023/123456, ABHA ID-ak zoddunk zatali. Rahul-an sanglam ki heachem zoddnem claim processing-ak vegin korunk upkari astolem. Ami tichi policy 10/07/2024-ak novem korun ghetlem dekhun dhanyavad, amchekodden te details tayar asle. Agent, Mr. Sharma, tankam surakshit dovrunk zor dila.
normalised: Online forman tika insurance policy vishayenui vicharlem. Distai, tichi Star Health Insurance policy number, S-H-I slash don hazar ani teis slash ek don tin char panch sauu, A-B-H-A I-D-ek joddunk zata. Rahul-an sangem ki assa joddlear tankam veg-vegllyak davyak lagun veg timar korunk mellta. Ami tichi policy dha July don hazar ani chovisak navin keli tedna amkam te khole sompeponan melltoch. Agent, Mister Sharma, te save korun dovornk sanglem.

unnormalised: Puri process korunk lagbhag ek vor laglo, punn ami Dadik finally ticho ABHA ID melloun ghetlo. Rahul-an aplya phone-acher ABHA app download kelem. Tannem mhaka dakhoylam ki tiche soglle medical reports konekt zatale, mhonnun doctorsank tiche history-chek upkar zatalem. Tem healthcare-ak modern korpak ek vhodd pavool dislem. Doctor, Dr. Kapoor, hospitalant tannem mhonnlem ki govt. he identifiersank universal ghevnkachea vattacher asa.
normalised: Saglli prakriya eka horak lagli, pun ami zaitoch Dadi-cho A-B-H-A I-D ghetlo. Rahul-an A-B-H-A app aplea phone-achea talevar download kelem. Tannem mhojem dishkaulem ki kashim tiche saglle doctori report zoddunk zatat, jen doctorank ticho itihas pasarak mellonk sompem zata. Taka dista ki doctori sevek navin doronn divonke eka mottea podachem. Hospitalacho doctor, Dr. Kapoor, sangonk sodlem ki sarkaran hem identifiers-ak sobhankhi vapruk bhazoonk kitek utsukta dista.

unnormalised: Dadi bari zata asta, hanv he health identifiers-achem mahatva samajonk laglem. Tem fakt number vixim na; tem soglleank quality healthcare ghevnkachi satya divpak zai, khas korun seniors-ak jevank aplyakuch details ugddas nasunk xoktat. Local chemistui vichorpak lagle ki customers-ak ABHA ID asa mhonnun tankam prescriptions link korunk zatat. Tem spasht asa ki ABHA ID ani UHID Indian healthcare landscapacho ek avashyak bhag zait asa, ani tem amam soglleank zanno zai.
normalised: Dadi borim zatana, hanven hem doctori identifiers-acho mahatv somzonk laglem. Te ek number aspaiche visheyk lagunuch nhoi; te hem dhyaan dovorkonke asalem ki subhankhi doctori sevek sadarponan mellonk zata, tech bhaxen vhoddlenchi mhankaajeechi jikank tankam sangllyo khole aaplye jhapeank yevkonk nashak tat. Tech bhaxen loocal chemist-anchem vicharunk laglem ki clientanchelagin A-B-H-A I-D asa kitea mhunn je tannem prescriptions-achelaagin joddunk mellot. Hem distai ki A-B-H-A I-D ani U-H-I-D Bharoti doctori sovaichem mukhtyo ang zalea, ani tea visheyan ami sobhankhinchi khobor dovronk zai.
